segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I feel a sense of fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be encouraging him, which makes me even more nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they both know they shouldn't be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is solely on the cookies, not on his precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I want to shout a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they are so quiet and careful, trying not to be noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope their mother turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
